description: Details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 24 (External lighting -  Block B and Block F3 only) of planning permission ref. 1331/APP/2019/2314 dated 28-06-2021 (Development of 4 no. new buildings comprising residential units (in addition to those approved under planning permission ref: 1331/APP/2017/1883), a basement extension to Block B, flexible commercial uses (Class E) and associated landscaping, access, car parking and other engineering works).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Please be advised that this application permits the partial discharge of Condition 24, attached to planning permission reference 1331/APP/2019/2314, in relation to Blocks B and F3 only.

Any lighting associated with the development (including vehicle lights) must not interfere with the sighting of signalling apparatus and/or train drivers' vision on approaching trains. The location and colour of lights must not give rise to the potential for confusion with the signalling arrangements on the railway.
